title: *Lower Allston 3 Bed, 2 Bath- Available ASAP! Close to Harvard!*
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $2,700 / Month
Beds: 3
Bath: 2
Available Date: 07/01/2022
Pet: No Pets
Parking:: street parking
Large Lower Allston 3 bedroom plus office apartment.
Features include newly renovated eat in kitchen, updated appliances, hardwood floors and spacious bedrooms.
The unit has 3 bedrooms and one large room that can be used as an office or additional storage.
Tenant pays gas heat, hot water and electric.
There is laundry in the basement and plenty of resident/ on street parking nearby.
Call or email Jenna for more details
